ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 CORINTHIANS

block.text: 2 CORINTHIANS

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 CORINTHIANS 1
Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God, and Timothy our brother, to the assembly of God which is at Corinth. With all the saints who are in the whole of Achaia:

block.text: Mi Pol, mi aposel bilong Krais Jisas. Long laik bilong em yet God i makim mi olsem aposel. Mi wantaim brata Timoti mitupela i raitim dispela pas long yupela manmeri bilong sios bilong God i stap long taun Korin, wantaim olgeta manmeri bilong God i stap long olgeta hap bilong provins Akaia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

block.text: God Papa bilong yumi, wantaim Bikpela Jisas Krais, i ken marimari long yupela na mekim bel bilong yupela i stap isi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of mercies and God of all comfort.

block.text: Yumi litimapim nem bilong God, em i God na Papa bilong Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais. Em i Papa bilong yumi, na em i as bilong olgeta pasin marimari na pasin sori. Em i God bilong mekim isi bel bilong olgeta man i gat hevi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He comforts us in all our affliction, that we may be able to comfort those who are in any affliction. We do this through the comfort with which we ourselves are comforted by God.

block.text: Long olgeta hevi i kamap long mipela, em i save mekim isi bel bilong mipela. Olsem na mipela inap long mekim isi bel bilong ol man i gat kain kain hevi, olsem God i save mekim isi bel bilong mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For as the sufferings of Christ abound to us, even so our comfort also abounds through Christ.

block.text: Bikpela pen Krais i bin karim, mipela tu i save karim. Olsem tasol bikpela bel isi bilong Krais i pulimapim mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if we are afflicted, it is for your comfort and salvation. If we are comforted, it is for your comfort. It produces in you the patient enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer.

block.text: Sapos mipela i karim hevi, em bilong mekim isi bel bilong yupela, na bilong God i ken kisim bek yupela. Na sapos God i mekim isi bel bilong mipela, em bilong mekim isi bel bilong yupela tu. Sapos yupela i sanap strong na karim kain pen olsem mipela i karim, orait God i save mekim isi bel bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Our hope for you is steadfast, knowing that, since you are partakers of the sufferings, so also are you of the comfort.

block.text: Na mipela i save bilip strong tru olsem yupela bai i sanap strong. Mipela i save, yupela i karim pen wantaim mipela, olsem na yupela bai i kisim bel isi wantaim mipela tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we don’t desire to have you uninformed, brothers, concerning our affliction which happened to us in Asia. We were weighed down exceedingly, beyond our power, so much that we despaired even of life.

block.text: Ol brata, mipela i laik bai yupela i save long dispela hevi i bin kamap long mipela long provins Esia. Bikpela hevi moa i bin daunim mipela, na i winim tru strong bilong mipela. Olsem na mipela i bin ting mipela bai i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yes, we ourselves have had the sentence of death within ourselves, that we should not trust in ourselves, but in God who raises the dead.

block.text: Tru yet, mipela i bin pilim wankain hevi olsem man i harim jas i tok long em i mas i dai. Dispela i bin kamap long mipela bai mipela i no ken ting moa long strong bilong mipela yet. Nogat. Mipela i mas ting long strong bilong God tasol, em i save kirapim bek ol man i dai pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: God delivered us out of so great a death, and does deliver; on him we have set our hope that he will also still deliver us.

block.text: Dispela samting nogut tru em inap tru long kilim mipela i dai, tasol God i bin kisim bek mipela. Na bihain tu em bai i kisim bek mipela. Mipela i bilip strong olsem, olgeta taim samting nogut i laik bagarapim mipela, God bai i kisim bek mipela, na mipela bai i stap gut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You also are helping together on our behalf by your supplication; that, for the gift bestowed on us by means of many, thanks may be given by many persons on your behalf.

block.text: Tasol yupela i mas helpim mipela long prea. Na God bai i harim prea bilong planti manmeri na em bai i helpim mipela. Na planti manmeri bai i lukim, na ol bai i tenkyu long God long ol samting em i mekim bilong helpim mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For our boasting is this: the testimony of our conscience, that in holiness and sincerity of God, not in fleshly wisdom but in the grace of God we behaved ourselves in the world, and more abundantly toward you.

block.text: Mi save amamas moa yet long dispela wanpela samting. Long bel bilong mi, mi save olsem, mi bin mekim stretpela pasin na pasin i tru long olgeta manmeri, em pasin God i bin givim mi. God i bin marimari long mi na givim dispela kain pasin long mi, na mi no bin kisim long kain save bilong yumi ol man bilong graun. Mi bin wokabaut long dispela pasin namel long olgeta man, tasol namel long yupela mi bin bihainim dispela pasin moa yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We write to you only what we know you can understand. I hope you will ubnderstand everything.

block.text: We write to you only what we know you can understand. I hope you will ubnderstand everything.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When Jesus comes again, you will be as proud of us as we are of you. Right now you do not understand us very well.

block.text: When Jesus comes again, you will be as proud of us as we are of you. Right now you do not understand us very well.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It was because of this that I was determined to come first to you, that you might have a second benefit.

block.text: It was because of this that I was determined to come first to you, that you might have a second benefit.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I wanted to stop and visit you on my way to Macedonia, and again from Macedonia to come to you, and to be sent forward by you on my journey to Judea.

block.text: I wanted to stop and visit you on my way to Macedonia, and again from Macedonia to come to you, and to be sent forward by you on my journey to Judea.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When I therefore was thus determined, did I show fickleness? Or the things that I purpose, do I purpose according to the flesh, that with me there should be the “Yes, yes” and the “No, no?”

block.text: Tasol olsem wanem? Yupela i ting mi bin mekim ol dispela tok bilong giamanim yupela tasol, a? Yupela i ting mi man bilong tok promis nating na senisim tok nabaut olsem ol man bilong graun i save mekim, na mi tok "Yes" na "Nogat" wantaim, a? Nogat tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But as God is faithful, our word toward you was not “Yes and no.”

block.text: God i save bihainim olgeta tok bilong em yet, na olsem tasol mi tok tru tumas long yupela, olgeta tok mi save mekim long yupela, em i no gat "Yes" na "Nogat" wantaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the Son of God, Jesus Christ, who was preached among you by us, by me, Silvanus, and Timothy, was not “Yes and no,” but in him is “Yes.”

block.text: Mi na Sailas na Timoti, mipela i bin autim tok namel long yupela, em tok bilong Jisas Krais, Pikinini Bilong God. Na yupela i save, Krais i no man bilong tok "Yes" na "Nogat" wantaim. Nogat. Oltaim Krais i save tok "Yes" tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For however many are the promises of God, in him is the “Yes.” Therefore also through him is the “Amen,” to the glory of God through us.

block.text: I gat planti promis bilong God i stap, na Krais i save tok "Yes" long dispela olgeta promis. Olsem na taim yumi harim tok bilong God, long nem bilong Krais yumi save tok "I tru", na yumi save litimapim nem bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now he who establishes us with you in Christ, and anointed us, is God.

block.text: Na God yet i save strongim mipela wantaim yupela, na yumi pas wantaim Krais na yumi stap strong. Na em i bin makim yumi bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has also sealed us, and gave us the down payment of the Spirit in our hearts.

block.text: Em i bin putim mak bilong em yet long yumi, na em i givim Holi Spirit bilong i stap long bel bilong yumi. Holi Spirit em i olsem namba wan hap bilong ol gutpela samting God i laik givim long yumi. Na yumi kisim Holi Spirit pinis, olsem na yumi ken save, tru tumas bai yumi kisim olgeta arapela samting tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I call God for a witness to my soul, that I didn’t come to Corinth to spare you.

block.text: Long nem bilong God, em man bilong strongim tok bilong mi, mi tok tru tumas olsem, mi no bin i kam kwik long Korin, long wanem, mi no laik givim hevi long yupela. Em tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Not that we have lordship over your faith, but are fellow workers with you for your joy. For you stand firm in faith.

block.text: Mi no tok olsem mipela i bosim bilip bilong yupela. Nogat. Long bilip yupela i sanap strong pinis. Mipela i save wok wantaim bilong kamapim amamas bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 CORINTHIANS 2
But I determined this for myself, that I would not come to you again in sorrow.

block.text: Mi no kam, long wanem, mi ting mobeta mi no kam long yupela long dispela taim na mekim yupela i bel hevi gen olsem bipo.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if I make you sorry, then who will make me glad but he who is made sorry by me?

block.text: Sapos mi mekim yupela i bel hevi, orait husat bai i stap bilong mekim bel bilong mi i amamas? Yupela ol lain mi bin mekim bel hevi, yupela tasol bai i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And I wrote this very thing to you, so that, when I came, I wouldn’t have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice; having confidence in you all, that my joy would be shared by all of you.

block.text: Yupela ol manmeri bilong mekim mi i amamas, olsem na mi no laik i kam long yupela na kisim bel hevi. Long dispela as tasol mi bin raitim pas mi salim i kam long yupela bipo. Mi save, sapos mi amamas long wanpela samting, orait yupela olgeta i save amamas long dispela tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote to you with many tears. Not that you should be made sorry, but that you might know the love that I have so abundantly for you.

block.text: Tru, taim mi raitim pas long yupela, mi wari moa yet na bel bilong mi i gat bikpela hevi tru na mi krai planti wantaim. Tasol mi no bin raitim dispela pas bilong givim bel hevi long yupela. Nogat. Mi raitim bilong yupela i ken save olsem, mi laikim yupela tumas na mi givim bel bilong mi moa yet long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if any has caused sorrow, he has caused sorrow, not to me, but in part (that I not press too heavily) to you all.

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i bin givim bel hevi long ol arapela, em i no givim bel hevi long mi. Nogat. Mi no laik mekim planti strongpela tok long dispela samting, tasol mi inap tok olsem, em i bin mekim yupela olgeta i bel hevi liklik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Sufficient to such a one is this punishment which was inflicted by the many;

block.text: Tasol dispela pe nogut bikpela lain bilong yupela i bin tok long dispela man i mas kisim, em inap long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: so that on the contrary you should rather forgive him and comfort him, lest by any means such a one should be swallowed up with his excessive sorrow.

block.text: Olsem na mobeta yupela i mekim narapela pasin nau. Mobeta yupela i lusim sin bilong em na mekim isi bel bilong en. Nogut bikpela bel hevi moa i daunim tru dispela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore I beg you to confirm your love toward him.

block.text: Olsem na mi laik bai yupela i soim em olsem yupela i laikim em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For to this end I also wrote, that I might know the proof of you, whether you are obedient in all things.

block.text: Dispela pas mi raitim bipo, em bilong traim yupela tasol. Mi laik save, yupela i save bihainim tok bilong mi long olgeta samting, o nogat?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I also forgive whomever you forgive anything. For if indeed I have forgiven anything, I have forgiven that one for your sakes in the person of Christ.

block.text: Na sapos yupela i lusim rong bilong wanpela man, orait mi tu mi save lusim. Na sapos i gat wanpela rong mi mas lusim, orait mi save lusim long ai bilong Krais, bilong helpim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: That way, no advantage may be gained over us by Satan; for we are not ignorant of his schemes.

block.text: Mi mekim olsem, long wanem, mi pret, nogut Satan i giamanim yumi na i winim yumi. Yumi save pinis long tingting na pasin bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now when I came to Troas for the Good News of Christ, a door was opened to me in the Lord.

block.text: Taim mi kam kamap long taun Troas bilong autim gutnius bilong Krais, Bikpela i bin opim rot long mi bilong mekim dispela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I had no relief for my spirit, because I didn’t find Titus, my brother, but taking my leave of them, I went out into Macedonia.

block.text: Tasol bel bilong mi em i no i stap isi. Long wanem, mi no lukim brata bilong mi Taitus. Olsem na mi lusim ol Troas na mi kam kamap long provins Masedonia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now thanks be to God, who always leads us in triumph in Christ, and reveals through us the sweet aroma of his knowledge in every place.

block.text: Tasol nau mi tenkyu long God, long wanem, oltaim em i save bringim mipela i go nabaut bilong tokaut long strongpela wok Krais i bin mekim bilong kisim bek mipela na mekim mipela i kamap lain bilong en. Na long dispela pasin olgeta lain manmeri i kisim save long God. I olsem switpela smel i kamap na win i karim i go nabaut long olgeta hap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we are a sweet aroma of Christ to God, in those who are saved, and in those who perish;

block.text: Tru tumas, mipela yet i olsem paura bilong kamapim smok i gat gutpela smel, em Krais i kisim na i ofaim long God. Dispela smel i save go namel long ol man i stap long rot bilong heven, na namel long ol man i stap long rot bilong hel tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: to the one a stench from death to death; to the other a sweet aroma from life to life. Who is sufficient for these things?

block.text: Long dispela lain i stap long rot bilong hel, dispela smel i olsem smel bilong dai, na em i save kamapim dai long ol. Tasol long lain i stap long rot bilong heven em i olsem smel bilong laip, na em i save kamapim laip long ol. Husat inap tru long mekim dispela kain wok?

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we are not as so many, which corrupt the word of God. But as of sincerity, but as of God, in the sight of God, we speak in Christ.

block.text: Tasol mipela i no olsem ol planti man, ol i save go nabaut na mekim wok bisnis long tok bilong God. Nogat. Mipela i kisim dispela wok long God yet na mipela i no save giaman nabaut. Mipela i wanbel wantaim Krais, na long ai bilong God mipela i save autim stret ol tok em i bin givim mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 CORINTHIANS 3
Are we beginning again to commend ourselves? Or do we need, as do some, letters of commendation to you or from you?

block.text: Ating mipela i mekim ol dispela tok, long wanem, mipela i laik grisim yupela gen bai yupela i ting mipela i stretpela man? O ating mipela i olsem ol sampela man na mipela i mas askim ol man long raitim pas i tokim yupela olsem mipela i gutpela man? O ating mipela i mas askim yupela long raitim kain pas olsem bilong helpim mipela? Nogat tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You are our letter, written in our hearts, known and read by all men.

block.text: Yupela yet i stap olsem pas bilong tokim ol man long pasin bilong mipela. Na ol tok bilong dispela pas em i stap long bel bilong mipela, na olgeta man i ken lukim na ritim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You are a letter of Christ, served by us. Not written with ink, but with the Spirit of the living God; not in tablets of stone, but in tablets that are hearts of flesh.

block.text: Yupela i stap ples klia olsem wanpela pas i kam long Krais. Long wok bilong mipela Krais i raitim dispela pas. Em i no raitim long ing. Nogat. Em i raitim long Spirit bilong God bilong i stap oltaim. Na em i no raitim antap long ol hap ston. Nogat. Em i raitim long bel bilong ol manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Such confidence we have through Christ toward God.

block.text: As bilong dispela tok i olsem. Long Krais God i bin makim mipela long mekim dispela wok, na mipela i save olsem God bai i mekim wok bilong en i kamap gutpela tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We know that we are not sufficient of ourselves, to account anything as from ourselves; but our sufficiency is from God.

block.text: Tru, mipela yet i no inap long mekim dispela wok, olsem na mipela i no ken tok mipela yet i bin mekim wanpela samting. Nogat. God wanpela tasol i save mekim mipela inap long dispela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: God made us sufficient as servants of a new covenant; not of the letter, but of the Spirit. For the letter kills, but the Spirit gives life.

block.text: Na em yet i bin mekim mipela inap long i stap wokman bilong nupela kontrak. Dispela kontrak em i no samting ol i bin raitim long buk bilong lo. Nogat. Em i samting bilong Holi Spirit. Tok bilong lo i save kilim man i dai, tasol Holi Spirit i save givim laip long man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The service of death, written engraved on stones, came with glory. With such glory that the children of Israel could not look steadfastly on the face of Moses for the glory of his face; which was passing away.

block.text: Tingim. Dispela wok God i mekim bilong givim lo, em i kamapim dai long ol manmeri. Na taim God i raitim dispela lo long ston na givim long ol, dispela lo i kam wantaim bikpela lait bilong God. Olsem na pastaim pes bilong Moses i lait tumas, na ol Israel i no inap lukluk long pes bilong en, na bihain tasol dispela lait i pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the service of the Spirit will be with much more glory.

block.text: Orait wok God i mekim bilong givim Holi Spirit long ol manmeri, em i winim tru dispela wok em i mekim bilong givim lo, na bikpela lait na strong bilong God bai i stap moa moa yet long dispela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if the service of condemnation has glory, the service of righteousness exceeds much more in glory.

block.text: Dispela wok bilong lo em i save kotim yumi na i tok yumi mas lus. Tasol sapos dispela wok i kam wantaim bikpela lait bilong God, orait wok bilong mekim ol manmeri i kamap stretpela long ai bilong God, em bai i kam wantaim bikpela lait bilong God moa moa yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For most certainly that which has been made glorious has not been made glorious in this respect, by reason of the glory that surpasses.

block.text: Bikpela lait na strong bilong God i stap moa moa yet wantaim dispela nupela wok God i mekim, na i winim tru lait bilong God i bin i stap wantaim olpela wok. Olsem na nau i luk olsem lait bilong dispela olpela wok i pinis olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if that which passes away was with glory, much more that which remains is in glory.

block.text: Dispela olpela wok i no inap i stap oltaim. Nogat. Em bai i pinis. Tasol em i bin kam wantaim bikpela lait bilong God. Olsem na yumi save, dispela nupela wok bilong i stap oltaim, em i kam wantaim bikpela lait bilong God moa moa yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Having therefore such a hope, we use great boldness of speech.

block.text: Mipela i bilip tru na wetim dispela lait bai i kamap moa yet long mipela na i stap oltaim, olsem na mipela i no save pret. Nogat. Mipela i save tokaut klia long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We do not do as Moses, who put a veil on his face, that the children of Israel wouldn’t look steadfastly on the end of that which was passing away.

block.text: Mipela i no save mekim olsem Moses i bin mekim. Long taim dispela lait i no pinis yet long pes bilong en, em i bin kisim hap laplap na haitim pes bilong en, bai ol Israel i no ken lukim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But their minds were hardened, for until this very day at the reading of the old covenant the same veil remains, because in Christ it passes away.

block.text: Na tingting bilong ol Israel i pas tru, na olgeta taim ol i ritim tok bilong olpela kontrak, ol i no inap klia long as bilong dispela tok ol i harim. I olsem dispela hap laplap i stap yet na em i pasim tingting bilong ol. I no gat man i bin rausim dispela laplap. Nogat. Long Krais wanpela tasol God i save rausim dispela laplap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But to this day, when Moses is read, a veil lies on their heart.

block.text: Yes, olgeta taim ol i ritim lo bilong Moses, i gat hap laplap i pasim tingting bilong ol, i kam inap long nau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But whenever one turns to the Lord, the veil is taken away.

block.text: Tasol sapos man i tanim bel i go long Bikpela, orait God i save rausim dispela hap laplap i bin pasim tingting bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the Lord is the Spirit and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is liberty.

block.text: Taim mi tok long Bikpela mi tok long Holi Spirit. Na sapos Spirit bilong Bikpela i stap long wanpela man, orait i no gat wanpela samting i pasim dispela man. Nogat. Em i stap fri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But we all, with unveiled face beholding as in a mirror the glory of the Lord, are transformed into the same image. From glory to glory, even as from the Lord, the Spirit.

block.text: Na yumi olgeta, yumi no gat samting i haitim pes bilong yumi. Olsem na bikpela lait bilong Bikpela i kam long yumi, na yumi kamap olsem glas bilong lukluk i save sutim dispela lait i go long ol arapela manmeri. Oltaim yumi save kisim dispela lait moa moa yet, na dispela i senisim yumi, na yumi kamap olsem piksa bilong Bikpela yet. Bikpela em i Spirit, na em i mekim olsem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 CORINTHIANS 4
Therefore seeing we have this ministry, even as we obtained mercy, we don’t faint.

block.text: God i bin sori long mipela na i givim dispela wok long mipela, olsem na mipela i no save slek long mekim dispela wok. Nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But we have renounced the hidden things of shame, not walking in craftiness, nor handling the word of God deceitfully; but by the manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man’s conscience in the sight of God.

block.text: Mipela i givim baksait pinis long olkain pasin nogut ol man i save hait na mekim. Mipela i no save wokabaut long pasin bilong giaman. Na mipela i no save senisim tok bilong God. Nogat. Mipela i save autim tok tru long ples klia, bai olgeta man i ken skelim pasin bilong mipela na long bel bilong ol, ol i ken save olsem mipela i mekim stretpela wok long ai bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even if our Good News is veiled, it is veiled in those who perish;

block.text: Na sapos sampela lain i no klia long as bilong dispela gutnius mipela i save autim, em ol dispela lain i stap long rot bilong hel tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: in whom the god of this world has blinded the minds of the unbelieving, that the light of the Good News of the glory of Christ, who is the image of God, should not dawn on them.

block.text: Satan, em giaman god bilong dispela graun, em i bin pasim tingting bilong ol dispela man i no bilip, na lait bilong gutnius bilong marimari na sori bilong Krais, em i no inap i go insait long bel bilong ol. Olsem na ol i no save lukim Krais, em i piksa tru bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we don’t preach ourselves, but Christ Jesus as Lord, and ourselves as your servants for Jesus’ sake.

block.text: Harim. Mipela i no save autim tok long ol pasin bilong mipela yet. Nogat. Mipela i save tokaut olsem, "Krais Jisas em i Bikpela bilong yumi, na mipela i bihainim tok bilong Jisas na mipela i stap olsem ol wokman bilong yupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: It is God who said, “Light will shine out of darkness.” He has shone in our hearts, to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ.

block.text: Bipo tru God i bin tok, "Insait long tudak lait i ken kamap." Na lait bilong God yet i bin i kam i stap long mipela, na i mekim bel bilong mipela i lait moa yet. Mipela i lukim pes bilong Jisas Krais na mipela i lukim lait tru na mipela i save long bikpela lait na strong bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But we have this treasure in clay vessels, that the exceeding greatness of the power may be of God, and not from ourselves.

block.text: Tasol dispela gutpela samting tru i stap long mipela aposel olsem em i stap insait long ol samting nating i no gat strong, olsem ol gutpela mani samting i stap insait long ol sospen graun. Em bilong olgeta man i ken save, dispela bikpela strong ol i lukim em i strong bilong God. Em i no strong bilong mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We are pressed on every side, yet not crushed; perplexed, yet not to despair;

block.text: Long olgeta hap, ol kain kain hevi i save kamap long mipela, tasol ol i no pinisim tru strong bilong mipela. Planti samting i save paulim tingting bilong mipela, tasol tingting bilong mipela i no bagarap olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: pursued, yet not forsaken; struck down, yet not destroyed;

block.text: Ol man i save mekim nogut long mipela, tasol God i no save lusim mipela. Ol i save paitim mipela na mekim mipela i pundaun, tasol ol i no bagarapim olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: always carrying in the body the putting to death of the Lord Jesus, that the life of Jesus may also be revealed in our body.

block.text: Long bodi bilong mipela oltaim mipela i save larim ol manmeri i lukim dai bilong Jisas. Olsem na laip bilong Jisas tu em i save kamap ples klia long bodi bilong mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we who live are always delivered to death for Jesus’ sake, that the life also of Jesus may be revealed in our mortal flesh.

block.text: Mipela i mekim wok bilong Jisas, olsem na long olgeta taim mipela i stap laip, ol man i save trai long kilim mipela i dai. Olsem na laip bilong Jisas tu em i save kamap ples klia long bodi bilong mipela, em dispela bodi bilong i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then death works in us, but life in you.
But having the same spirit of faith, according to that which is written,

block.text: Olsem na dai i save mekim wok bilong en long mipela aposel, tasol laip i save mekim wok long yupela.
Mipela i bilip long Jisas, na mipela i mekim wankain pasin olsem buk bilong God i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I believed, and therefore I spoke.”

block.text: "Mi bilip pinis long God, olsem na mi bin tokaut."

ReferenceBlocks.text: We also believe, and therefore also we speak;

block.text: Mipela tu i bilip, olsem na mipela tu i save tokaut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: knowing that he who raised the Lord Jesus will raise us also with Jesus, and will present us with you.

block.text: Mipela i save pinis olsem, God i bin kirapim Bikpela Jisas, na em bai i kirapim mipela tu wantaim Jisas, na bringim mipela wantaim yupela i go i stap klostu long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For all things are for your sakes, that the grace, being multiplied through the many, may cause the thanksgiving to abound to the glory of God.

block.text: Mi tok olsem, long wanem, mi save, dispela olgeta samting i save kamap long mipela bilong helpim yupela. Na long dispela pasin marimari bilong God i wok long kamap long planti manmeri moa, na ol dispela manmeri i ken tenkyu moa yet long God, na litimapim nem bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore we don’t faint, but though our outward man is decaying, yet our inward man is renewed day by day.

block.text: Mipela i tingting long dispela gutpela wok God i mekim na mipela i no save slek long mekim wok bilong God. Tru, bodi bilong mipela i laik bagarap. Tasol bel bilong mipela i save kamap nupela gen long olgeta de,

ReferenceBlocks.text: For our light affliction, which is for the moment, works for us more and more exceedingly an eternal weight of glory;

block.text: long wanem, mipela i save, ol dispela hevi na pen mipela i save karim, ol i no bikpela tumas, na ol bai i stap sotpela taim tasol. Na ol bai i helpim mipela long kisim gutpela sindaun tru long heven, na mipela bai i stap olsem oltaim oltaim. Na mipela i save, ol dispela gutpela samting mipela bai i kisim, ol i winim tru olgeta arapela samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We don’t look at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen. For the things which are seen are temporal, but the things which are not seen are eternal.

block.text: Yumi no save lukluk i go long ol samting yumi inap lukim long ai. Nogat. Yumi save lukluk strong long ol samting yumi no inap lukim long ai, long wanem, samting yumi save lukim long ai, em bai i stap sotpela taim tasol. Tasol ol dispela gutpela samting yumi no inap lukim long ai, ol bai i stap oltaim oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 CORINTHIANS 5
For we know that if the earthly house of our tent is dissolved, we have a building from God, a house not made with hands, eternal, in the heavens.

block.text: Yumi save pinis olsem, sapos dispela haus sel bilong graun nau yumi stap long en, em i bagarap, orait yumi gat narapela haus God i laik givim yumi. Dispela haus ol man i no bin wokim long han. Em i stap long heven, na em bai i stap oltaim oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For most certainly in this we groan, longing to be clothed with our new body which we will have in heaven;

block.text: Nau yumi stap long dispela haus hia, na yumi krai i stap. Yumi laikim tumas long kisim dispela haus bilong yumi i stap long heven na em bai i karamapim yumi olsem klos.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We will not be without a body. We will live in a new body.

block.text: Long wanem, taim yumi putim dispela pinis, yumi bai i no inap i stap olsem skin nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For indeed we who are in this tent do groan, being burdened; not that we desire to be unclothed, but that we desire to be clothed, that what is mortal may be swallowed up by life.

block.text: Taim yumi stap yet long dispela haus sel bilong graun, yumi save pilim hevi na yumi krai i stap. I no olsem yumi laik lusim olpela bodi. Nogat. Yumi laikim tumas long putim nupela bodi, olsem yumi putim nupela klos samting, na bai dispela bodi bilong i dai em i ken kisim laip tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now he who made us for this very thing is God, who also gave to us the down payment of the Spirit.

block.text: God yet i bin redim yumi bilong kisim dispela laip, na em i bin givim Holi Spirit long yumi. Holi Spirit em i olsem namba wan hap bilong ol gutpela samting God i laik givim long yumi. Na yumi kisim Holi Spirit pinis, olsem na yumi ken save, tru tumas bai yumi kisim olgeta arapela samting tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore we are always confident and know that while we are at home in the body, we are absent from the Lord;

block.text: Yumi save tingting long dispela na em i save strongim bel bilong yumi oltaim. Yumi save, taim yumi stap yet long dispela bodi, yumi no i stap wantaim Bikpela long ples bilong em. Nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: for we walk by faith, not by sight.

block.text: Nau yumi bilip tasol long em na yumi wokabaut. Yumi no lukim em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We are courageous, I say, and are willing rather to be absent from the body, and to be at home with the Lord.

block.text: Tasol mi tok pinis, bel bilong yumi i stap strong, na yumi laikim tumas long lusim dispela bodi hia na i go sindaun gut wantaim Bikpela, na ples em i stap long en, em bai i kamap ples tru bilong yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore also we make it our aim, whether at home or absent, to be well pleasing to him.

block.text: Tasol maski yumi stap long wanem ples, oltaim yumi save tingting strong long mekim ol pasin Bikpela i laikim,

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we must all be revealed before the judgment seat of Christ; that each one may receive the things in the body, according to what he has done, whether good or bad.

block.text: long wanem, yumi save, yumi olgeta i mas kamap long kot bilong Krais. Na sapos yumi bin mekim gutpela pasin long taim yumi stap long bodi o sapos yumi bin mekim pasin nogut, yumi olgeta wan wan bai i kisim pe inap long pasin yumi bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Knowing therefore the fear of the Lord, we persuade men, but we are revealed to God; and I hope that we are revealed also in your consciences.

block.text: Orait mipela i save pret long Bikpela na i stap aninit long em, olsem na mipela i save wok long kirapim tingting bilong ol man bai ol i bilip long em. Na mipela i no save mekim dispela wok long ol pasin i no stret. Nogat. God i save pinis long olgeta tingting na pasin bilong mipela. Na mi bilip olsem, long bel bilong yupela, yupela tu i save olsem mipela i mekim stretpela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we are not commending ourselves to you again, but speak as giving you occasion of boasting on our behalf, that you may have something to answer those who boast in appearance, and not in heart.

block.text: Long dispela tok mipela i no stat gen long grisim yupela bai yupela i ting mipela i stretpela man. Nogat. Mipela i raitim dispela tok bilong yupela i ken amamas long pasin bilong mipela. Mipela i laik bai yupela inap bekim tok bilong ol man i save amamas nating long nem bilong ol man, na ol i no amamas long ol pasin i kamap long bel bilong ol man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if we are beside ourselves, it is for God. Or if we are of sober mind, it is for you.

block.text: Tasol sapos i tru pasin na tok bilong mipela i olsem bilong ol longlong man, maski, mipela i mekim wok bilong God. Na sapos mipela i tingting stret, orait mipela i mekim olsem bilong helpim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the love of Christ constrains us; because we judge thus, that one died for all, therefore all died.

block.text: Krais i bin givim bel bilong en long mipela, na dispela i save kirapim mipela long wok, long wanem, mipela i save pinis olsem, wanpela man i bin kisim ples bilong yumi olgeta na i dai, na long dispela rot yumi olgeta i dai pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He died for all, that those who live should no longer live to themselves, but to him who for their sakes died and rose again.

block.text: Dispela man i mekim olsem bilong helpim yumi ol man i stap laip, bai yumi no ken tingting moa long yumi yet na wokabaut. Nogat. Yumi ken tingting long dispela man i kisim ples bilong yumi na i dai pinis, na i kirap bek tu. Yumi ken tingting long em na wokabaut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore we know no one after the flesh from now on. Even though we have known Christ after the flesh, yet now we know him so no more.

block.text: Olsem na nau yumi no save bihainim tingting bilong olpela bel na skelim pasin bilong ol manmeri. Tru, bipo yumi bin tingting long pasin bilong olpela bel na skelim pasin bilong Krais. Tasol nau yumi no save skelim em moa long dispela pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creature. The old things have passed away. Behold, all things have become new.

block.text: Olsem na sapos wanpela man i pas wantaim Krais, orait God i mekim em i kamap nupela man tru. Harim gut. Nau olpela pasin i pinis olgeta, na nupela pasin i kamap pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But all things are of God, who reconciled us to himself through Jesus Christ, and gave to us the ministry of reconciliation;

block.text: God yet i mekim dispela olgeta samting i kamap long yumi. Bipo yumi stap birua bilong em, tasol long Krais em i mekim yumi i kamap wanbel wantaim em. Na em i givim mipela dispela wok bilong helpim em long mekim ol birua bilong en i kamap wanbel wantaim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: namely, that God was in Christ reconciling the world to himself, not reckoning to them their trespasses. He has committed to us the word of reconciliation.

block.text: Tok bilong mipela i olsem. God i bin i stap long Krais na i wok long mekim olgeta man i lusim pasin birua na i kamap wanbel wantaim em. Em i no tingting moa long olgeta rong ol i bin mekim. Na em i givim mipela wok bilong autim dispela tok, bilong em i ken mekim ol birua i kamap wanbel wantaim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We are therefore ambassadors on behalf of Christ, as though God were entreating by us: we beg you on behalf of Christ, be reconciled to God.

block.text: Olsem na mipela i kisim maus bilong Krais na autim tok bilong en. I olsem God yet i singaut long olgeta man long maus bilong mipela. Mipela i save autim tok bilong Krais yet long olgeta man, na mipela i tokim ol olsem, "Mobeta yupela lusim pasin birua na kamap wanbel wantaim God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: For him who knew no sin he made to be sin on our behalf; so that in him we might become the righteousness of God.

block.text: Krais i no save mekim sin, tasol God i laik helpim yumi, olsem na em i bin bungim olgeta sin bilong yumi antap long em, na Krais i kamap olsem man bilong mekim sin tru. God i mekim olsem bai yumi ken i stap long Krais, na long strong bilong em yumi ken kamap stretpela manmeri bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 CORINTHIANS 6
Working together, we entreat also that you not receive the grace of God in vain,
for he says,

block.text: Mipela i save wok wantaim God na mipela i tok strong long yupela olsem, "Yupela i kisim pinis marimari bilong God, na nogut yupela i lusim nating marimari bilong em."
God i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “At an acceptable time I listened to you, in a day of salvation I helped you.”

block.text: "Mi yet mi bin makim taim bilong kisim bek yu na mekim gut long yu, na long dispela taim stret mi bin harim krai bilong yu na helpim yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, now is the acceptable time. Behold, now is the day of salvation.

block.text: Harim. Nau tasol em i taim bilong God i mekim gut long yumi. Nau tasol em i taim bilong God i kisim bek yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We give no occasion of stumbling in anything, that our service may not be blamed,

block.text: Mipela i no laik bai ol man i tok nogut long dispela wok bilong mipela, olsem na mipela i no save mekim wanpela samting i save sutim lek bilong ol dispela man na ol i pundaun. Nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: but in everything commending ourselves, as servants of God, in great endurance, in afflictions, in hardships, in distresses,

block.text: Mipela i stap wokman bilong God, olsem na oltaim mipela i save soim gutpela pasin bilong mipela long olgeta manmeri. Mipela i save sanap strong tru long ol kain kain hevi i save kamap long mipela, na long ol samting i save mekim nogut long mipela, na long ol samting i save bagarapim mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: in beatings, in imprisonments, in riots, in labors, in watchings, in fastings;

block.text: Ol i save paitim mipela na kalabusim mipela. Ol birua i save banisim mipela na singaut nogut long mipela. Mipela i save hatwok tru. Mipela i no save slip gut, na mipela i save stap hangre.

ReferenceBlocks.text: in pureness, in knowledge, in patience, in kindness, in the Holy Spirit, in sincere love,

block.text: Mipela i save mekim klinpela pasin na holim gutpela save. Mipela i no save kros kwiktaim. Nogat. Mipela i save mekim gut long ol manmeri. Mipela i save kisim strong bilong Holi Spirit. Mipela i save mekim tru pasin bilong laikim tru ol arapela. Mipela i no save tok long maus tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: in the word of truth, in the power of God; by the armor of righteousness on the right hand and on the left,

block.text: Mipela i save autim tok tru, na mipela i save mekim wok long strong bilong God. Mipela i save holim stretpela pasin tasol olsem samting bilong pait i stap long han sut na long han kais, na long dispela pasin mipela i save pait long mekim wok bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: by glory and dishonor, by evil report and good report; as deceivers, and yet true;

block.text: Sampela man i save litimapim nem bilong mipela, na sampela i save daunim nem bilong mipela. Sampela i save tok baksait long mipela, na sampela i save tokim ol arapela man long mipela i mekim gutpela pasin. Sampela man i ting mipela i man bilong giaman, tasol nogat, mipela i save mekim tok tru tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: as unknown, and yet well known; as dying, and behold, we live; as punished, and not killed;

block.text: I olsem i no gat man i save long mipela, tasol planti man i save long mipela. Mipela i olsem man i laik i dai, tasol nogat, mipela i stap laip yet. I olsem God i givim kanda long mipela bilong stretim mipela, tasol em i no kilim mipela i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: as sorrowful, yet always rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.

block.text: I olsem mipela i stap bel hevi tru, tasol maski, oltaim mipela i save amamas. Mipela i stap olsem ol rabisman, tasol maski, mipela i save helpim ol manmeri long kisim planti samting. I olsem mipela i no gat wanpela samting, tasol mipela i gat olgeta samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Our mouth is open to you, Corinthians. Our heart is enlarged.

block.text: Yupela Korin, mipela i tokaut ples klia long yupela. Mipela i givim bel bilong mipela moa yet long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You are not restricted by us, but you are restricted by your own affections.

block.text: Mipela i no pasim bel bilong mipela. Nogat. Mipela i laikim tumas yupela. Tasol yupela yet i pasim bel bilong yupela, na yumi no stap wanbel tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now in return, I speak as to my children, you also be open wide.

block.text: Nau mi tokim yupela olsem papa i tokim ol pikinini bilong en. Yupela i mas mekim wankain pasin olsem mipela i mekim long yupela. Yupela tu i mas givim bel bilong yupela olgeta long mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t be unequally yoked with unbelievers, for what fellowship have righteousness and iniquity? Or what fellowship has light with darkness?

block.text: Ol haiden ol i narakain, olsem na yupela i no ken pas wantaim ol na wok bung wantaim ol. Olsem wanem, stretpela pasin na pasin bilong sakim lo tupela i ken wok bung wantaim? Olsem wanem, lait i ken bung wantaim tudak?

ReferenceBlocks.text: What agreement has Christ with Belial? Or what portion has a believer with an unbeliever?

block.text: Ating Krais i save stap wanbel wantaim Satan, a? Man i bilip long Krais na man i no bilip, tupela i ken holim wanpela kain tingting, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: What agreement has a temple of God with idols? For you are a temple of the living God. Even as God said,

block.text: Olsem wanem, bai yumi bungim haus bilong God wantaim haus lotu bilong ol giaman god? Yupela i save, yumi yet yumi stap haus bilong God bilong i stap oltaim, olsem bipo God i bin tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they will be my people.”

block.text: "Bai mi stap wantaim ol na wokabaut namel long ol. Na bai mi stap God bilong ol, na ol bai i stap ol lain manmeri bilong mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore “‘Come out from among them, and be separate,’ says the Lord. ‘Touch no unclean thing. I will receive you.

block.text: Olsem na Bikpela i tok moa olsem, "'Yupela i mas lusim ol, na i go i stap long narapela hap. Na yupela i mas lukaut gut, nogut yupela i pas long ol samting i no klin long ai bilong God. Na bai mi yet mi kisim yupela

ReferenceBlocks.text: I will be to you a Father. You will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.”

block.text: na bai mi stap Papa bilong yupela, na yupela bai i stap pikinini bilong mi.' Bikpela, em God I Gat Olgeta Strong, em i tok olsem."

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 CORINTHIANS 7
Having therefore these promises, beloved, let us cleanse ourselves from all defilement of flesh and spirit, perfecting holiness in the fear of God.

block.text: Ol brata tru bilong mi, yumi kisim pinis ol dispela promis bilong God. Olsem na yumi mas rausim olgeta pasin doti bilong bodi na bilong spirit, na yumi mas kamap klin olgeta long ai bilong God. Na yumi mas pret na aninit long God na yumi mas givim yumi yet olgeta long God na bihainim tru pasin holi oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Open your hearts to us. We wronged no one. We corrupted no one. We took advantage of no one.

block.text: Yupela i mas givim bel bilong yupela long mipela. Mipela i no bin mekim nogut long wanpela man. Mipela i no bin bagarapim wanpela. Mipela i no bin giamanim wanpela man na kisim ol samting bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I say this not to condemn you, for I have said before, that you are in our hearts to die together and live together.

block.text: Mi no laik sutim tok long yupela na mi mekim dispela tok. Nogat. Mi tok pinis olsem, mipela i givim bel bilong mipela long yupela, na mipela bai i laikim yupela yet, maski yumi dai o yumi stap laip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Great is my boldness of speech toward you. Great is my boasting on your behalf. I am filled with comfort. I overflow with joy in all our affliction.

block.text: Mi save olsem, mi ken tokaut stret long yupela, na mi no mas haitim tok. Mi amamas moa yet long yupela, na bel bilong mi i stap isi tru. Maski ol dispela hevi i save kamap long mipela, mi save tingting yet long yupela, na dispela i mekim amamas i pulap tru long bel bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For even when we had come into Macedonia, our flesh had no relief, but we were afflicted on every side. Fightings were outside. Fear was inside.

block.text: Taim mipela i go i stap long Masedonia, mipela i no inap malolo liklik. Nogat. Long dispela hap tu ol kain kain hevi i bin kamap long mipela oltaim. Ol man i bin tok pait wantaim mipela, na mipela i kirap nogut na bel bilong mipela i pret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Nevertheless, he who comforts the lowly, God, comforted us by the coming of Titus;

block.text: Tasol God i save mekim isi bel bilong ol manmeri i stap bel hevi. Na em i salim Taitus i kam long mipela, na long dispela pasin em i mekim isi bel bilong mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and not by his coming only, but also by the comfort with which he was comforted in you. He has told us of your longing, your mourning, and your zeal for me; so that I rejoiced still more.

block.text: Na i no long dispela rot tasol God i mekim isi bel bilong mipela. Nogat. Pastaim yupela i bin mekim isi bel bilong Taitus, na em i tokim mipela long dispela pasin bilong yupela. Olsem na long dispela pasin tu God i mekim isi bel bilong mipela. Taitus i tokim mipela olsem yupela i laikim tumas long lukim mi, na bel bilong yupela i sori, na yupela i tingting tumas long i stap wanbel wantaim mi. Olsem na mi amamas moa yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For though I made you sorry with my letter, I do not regret it, though I did regret it. For I see that my letter made you sorry, though just for a while.

block.text: Mi save, pas bilong mi em i bin mekim yupela i bel hevi, tasol mi no sori tumas long dispela. Tru, bipo mi sori, tasol nau nogat. Mi save, dispela pas i bin givim bel hevi long yupela na mekim yupela i sem, tasol em i bilong sotpela taim tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I now rejoice, not that you were made sorry, but that you were made sorry to repentance. For you were made sorry in a godly way, that you might suffer loss by us in nothing.

block.text: Na nau mi amamas, tasol mi no amamas long bel hevi bilong yupela. Nogat. Mi amamas, long wanem, dispela bel hevi na sem i bin mekim yupela i tanim bel. Mi save, God yet i bin kamapim dispela bel hevi na sem long yupela, olsem na tok bilong mipela i no bin bagarapim yupela liklik. Nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For godly sorrow works repentance to salvation, which brings no regret. But the sorrow of the world works death.

block.text: Bel hevi na sem God i save kamapim, dispela i save mekim yumi man i tanim bel. Na long dispela pasin God i save kisim bek yumi, olsem na yumi no ken sori long yumi mas tanim bel. Tasol bel hevi na sem i kamap long pasin bilong ol man bilong graun, dispela i save kamapim dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For behold, this same thing, that you were made sorry in a godly way, what earnest care it worked in you. Yes, what defense, indignation, fear, longing, zeal, and vengeance! In everything you demonstrated yourselves to be pure in the matter.

block.text: Yupela i mas tingting gut. Dispela bel hevi God i bin givim long yupela, em i bin kamapim ol kain kain gutpela pasin long yupela. Long dispela pasin God i hariapim yupela, na yupela i kirap long stretim tok bilong yupela. Em i kirapim yupela long krosim man i bin mekim rong, na i mekim yupela i pret long God. Nau yupela i wari tru long mipela, na yupela i strong long stretim pasin bilong dispela man i bin mekim rong. Long olgeta samting yupela i mekim bilong stretim dispela tok, pasin bilong yupela i soim klia olsem, yupela i no gat asua.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So although I wrote to you, I wrote not for his cause that did the wrong, nor for his cause that suffered the wrong. I wrote that your earnest care for us might be revealed in you in the sight of God.

block.text: Taim mi raitim dispela pas long yupela, mi no bin ting long stretim pasin bilong man i bin mekim rong na mi raitim. Na mi no ting long arapela man, dispela man i bin mekim rong long en. Nogat. Mi laik bai gutpela pasin bilong yupela i ken kamap ples klia, na long ai bilong God yupela i ken save gut olsem, yupela i laikim mipela tru. Long dispela as tasol mi bin raitim dispela pas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore we have been comforted. In our comfort we rejoiced the more exceedingly for the joy of Titus, because his spirit has been refreshed by you all.

block.text: Na nau dispela pasin bilong yupela i mekim bel bilong mipela i stap isi tru. moa yet, long wanem, yupela olgeta i bin pinisim ol wari bilong Taitus na mekim bel bilong en i gutpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if in anything I have boasted to him on your behalf, I was not disappointed. But as we spoke all things to you in truth, so our glorying also which I made before Titus was found to be truth.

block.text: Bipo mi bin tokim Taitus long ol gutpela pasin bilong yupela na mi bin litimapim nem bilong yupela, na mi no kisim sem long dispela tok bilong mi. Nogat. Olgeta tok mipela i bin mekim long pasin bilong yupela, em i tru. Olsem tasol nau Taitus i save, dispela tok mipela i bin mekim bilong litimapim nem bilong yupela, em i tru olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His affection is more abundantly toward you, while he remembers all of your obedience, how with fear and trembling you received him.

block.text: Taim Taitus i kam long yupela, yupela i bin pret na guria, na yupela i kisim em na yupela olgeta i bihainim tok bilong em. Em i tingim yet dispela pasin bilong yupela na bel bilong en i sori tru long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I rejoice that in everything I am confident concerning you.

block.text: Nau mi amamas tru, long wanem, mi bilip strong olsem, yupela bai i mekim ol stretpela pasin tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 CORINTHIANS 8
Moreover, brothers, we make known to you the grace of God which has been given in the assemblies of Macedonia;

block.text: Ol brata, mipela i laik toksave long yupela long pasin God i bin marimari long ol manmeri bilong ol sios bilong provins Masedonia na helpim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They have been put to the test by much trouble, but they have much joy. They have given much even though they were very poor.

block.text: Bikpela hevi i bin kamap long ol na dispela i traim tru bel bilong ol. Na long dispela taim ol i stap rabis tru. Tasol God i bin mekim ol i amamas moa yet, na ol i tingting long ol arapela Kristen na ol i bungim planti mani samting bilong helpim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For according to their power, I testify, yes and beyond their power, they gave of their own accord.

block.text: Mi laik tokaut klia olsem, ol i bin bihainim laik bilong ol yet na ol i givim dispela mani. Sapos ol i gat samting inap long ol i givim, orait ol i bin givim. Na ol i winim dispela na i givim moa yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They begged us with much entreaty to receive this grace and the fellowship in the service to the saints.

block.text: Ol i tokim mipela strong tru long mipela i mas larim ol i wok wantaim ol manmeri bilong ol arapela sios long helpim ol manmeri bilong God i stap long distrik Judia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This was not as we had hoped, but first they gave their own selves to the Lord, and to us through the will of God.

block.text: Mipela i bin ting olsem, ol bai i givim sampela mani. Tasol pasin bilong ol i winim dispela. Pastaim ol i givim ol yet long Bikpela, na ol i bihainim laik bilong God na givim ol yet long mipela tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So we urged Titus, that as he made a beginning before, so he would also complete in you this grace.

block.text: Bipo Taitus i bin kirapim dispela wok bilong marimari namel long yupela. Olsem na mipela i strong long em i mas go bek long yupela na pinisim dispela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But as you abound in everything, in faith, utterance, knowledge, all earnestness, and in your love to us, see that you also abound in this grace.

block.text: Long olgeta samting yupela i save mekim gutpela pasin tru. Yupela i save bilip strong long God, na yupela i save wok strong long tokaut long dispela bilip. Yupela i gat planti save, na yupela i gat bikpela laik tru long mekim wok bilong God. Na yupela i save laikim mipela tru. Orait olsem tasol nau yupela i mas mekim gutpela pasin moa long dispela wok bilong marimari tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I speak not by way of commandment, but as proving through the earnestness of others the sincerity also of your love.

block.text: I no olsem mi laik givim tok bilong yupela i mas bihainim. Nogat. Mi toksave long yupela long pasin bilong ol arapela manmeri i kirap tru long mekim dispela wok, na long dispela pasin i olsem mi traim yupela, bai yupela i ken soim olsem, pasin bilong yupela bilong laikim tru ol arapela, em i samting tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that, though he was rich, yet for your sakes he became poor, that you through his poverty might become rich.

block.text: Yupela i save pinis long marimari bilong Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais. Em i gat planti samting, tasol em i kamap olsem rabisman tru, bai em i ken helpim yupela. Em i bin kamap rabisman bai em i ken helpim yupela long kisim planti samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I give a judgment in this: for this is expedient for you, who were the first to start a year ago, not only to do, but also to be willing.

block.text: Nau mi laik autim tingting bilong mi long yupela long dispela wok bilong bungim mani. Long las yia yupela i kirapim dispela wok, na yupela i laikim tumas long mekim olsem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now complete the doing also, that as there was the readiness to be willing, so there may be the completion also out of your ability.

block.text: Orait nau i gutpela sapos yupela i wok strong long pinisim dispela wok. Bipo bel bilong yupela i kirap long mekim dispela wok, na olsem tasol nau yupela i ken hariap long pinisim, inap long skel bilong ol samting bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if the readiness is there, it is acceptable according to what you have, not according to what you don’t have.

block.text: Sapos man i laikim tumas long givim samting, orait God i laikim tumas long kisim. God i save ting long ol samting ol wan wan man ol inap long givim, na em i kisim ol samting ol i givim. Em i no save ting long ol samting man i no gat, na em i skelim pasin bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This is not that others may be eased and you distressed.

block.text: Mi no tok yupela i mas karim bikpela hevi, bai ol arapela manmeri i ken i stap gut. Nogat. Mi laik bai yumi olgeta i mas mekim wankain pasin long ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It is for equality. Your abundance at this present time supplies their lack. One day their abundance also may become a supply for your lack; that there may be equality.
As it is written,

block.text: Nau long dispela taim yupela i gat planti samting, na yupela i ken givim ol samting bilong helpim ol manmeri i sot. Na bihain, sapos yupela i sot na ol i gat planti, orait ol i ken givim ol samting bilong helpim yupela. Olsem na yupela olgeta bai i mekim wankain pasin na yupela olgeta bai i stap gut.
Em i olsem buk bilong God i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He who gathered much had nothing left over, and he who gathered little had no lack.”

block.text: "Kaikai bilong ol man i kisim planti, em i no winim mak bilong ol. Na ol man i kisim liklik tasol, kaikai bilong ol i no sot."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But thanks be to God, who puts the same earnest care for you into the heart of Titus.

block.text: Mi tenkyu long God, em i kirapim bel bilong Taitus, na em i gat wankain tingting olsem mipela. Em tu i laikim tumas long helpim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he indeed accepted our exhortation, but being himself very earnest, he went out to you of his own accord.

block.text: Mipela i bin askim em long go bek long yupela, na em i orait. Tasol em tu i laikim tumas long mekim dispela wok, olsem na long laik bilong em yet em i go long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We have sent together with him the brother whose praise in the Good News is known through all the assemblies.

block.text: Na mipela i salim wanpela brata i go wantaim em. Long olgeta sios dispela brata i gat nem long wok bilong autim gutnius.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Not only so, but who was also appointed by the assemblies to travel with us in this grace. It is served by us to the glory of the Lord himself, and to show our readiness.

block.text: Na i no long dispela tasol. Nogat. Ol sios i bin makim em bilong em i ken wokabaut wantaim mipela na helpim mipela long mekim dispela wok marimari bilong bungim mani samting. Mipela i mekim dispela wok bilong litimapim nem bilong Bikpela yet, na bilong soim ol man olsem, bel bilong mipela i kirap long mekim dispela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We are avoiding this, that any man should blame us concerning this abundance which is administered by us.

block.text: Mipela i no laik bai wanpela man i tok nogut long pasin mipela i mekim bilong lukautim dispela bikpela presen ol man i givim. Olsem na mipela i kisim dispela brata i kam wantaim mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Having regard for honorable things, not only in the sight of the Lord, but also in the sight of men.

block.text: Mipela i laik mekim gutpela pasin tasol, na mipela i no laik mekim dispela pasin long ai bilong Bikpela tasol. Nogat. Long ai bilong ol man tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We have sent with them our brother, whom we have many times proved earnest in many things. But now much more earnest, by reason of the great confidence which he has in you.

block.text: Na mipela i salim narapela brata tu bilong mipela i go wantaim tupela. Planti taim mipela i traim em long ol kain kain wok, na mipela i lukim em i strong long mekim wok. Em i save tru olsem yupela bai i mekim gutpela pasin tasol, olsem na nau em i gat bikpela laik long mekim dispela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As for Titus, he is my partner and fellow worker for you. As for our brothers, they are the apostles of the assemblies, the glory of Christ.

block.text: Yupela i save pinis long Taitus. Em i poroman bilong mi na wanwok bilong mi long wok bilong helpim yupela. Na long dispela tupela brata bilong mipela yupela i ken save olsem, tupela i stap wokman bilong ol sios, na tupela i save litimapim nem bilong Krais long wok bilong tupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore show the proof of your love to them in front of the assemblies, and of our boasting on your behalf.

block.text: Orait yupela i mas mekim gutpela pasin long ol dispela man, na bai ol manmeri bilong ol sios i ken save tru long pasin bilong yupela long laikim tru ol arapela. Na ol i ken save mipela i no tok amamas nating long gutpela pasin yupela i save mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 CORINTHIANS 9
It is indeed unnecessary for me to write to you concerning the service to the saints.

block.text: Yupela i save pinis long dispela presen mipela i bungim bilong helpim ol manmeri bilong God. Olsem na mi no ken raitim longpela tok long dispela samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I know your readiness, of which I boast on your behalf to them of Macedonia, that Achaia has been prepared for a year past. Your zeal has stirred up very many of them.

block.text: Mi save pinis, bel bilong yupela i kirap long mekim dispela wok bilong helpim ol arapela, na oltaim mi save litimapim nem bilong yupela long ai bilong ol Masedonia. Mi tokim ol olsem, "Long las yia ol Akaia ol i redi pinis long kirapim dispela wok." Na taim ol i harim dispela tok long yupela i gat laik tru bilong givim ol samting, dispela i kirapim bel bilong planti Masedonia tu long givim ol samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I have sent the brothers that our boasting on your behalf may not be in vain in this respect, that, just as I said, you may be prepared.

block.text: Tasol mi no laik bai dispela tok mipela i mekim bilong litimapim nem bilong yupela em i kamap olsem toktok nating. Nogat. Mi laik bai yupela i mas i stap redi long givim ol samting, olsem mi bin tokim ol. Mi ting long dispela, olsem na mi salim ol dispela brata i kam long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This is so that I won’t by any means, if there come with me any of Macedonia and find you unprepared, we (to say nothing of you) should be disappointed in this confident boasting.

block.text: Mipela i bilip tru olsem yupela i redi long givim ol samting. Tasol mi ting, nogut sampela Masedonia ol i go wantaim mi na ol i lukim yupela i no redi, na bai mipela i kisim sem long dispela, na yupela tu wantaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I thought it necessary therefore to entreat the brothers that they would go before to you. I did this that they might arrange ahead of time the generous gift that you promised before, that the same might be ready as a matter of generosity, and not of greediness.

block.text: Olsem na mi ting mi mas tokim ol brata long ol i mas i go pas na i kam long yupela, na helpim yupela long redim dispela presen yupela i tok pinis long salim i go. Na taim mi kam, ol man bai i lukim olsem yupela i amamas long givim dispela presen, na i no olsem mipela i pulim ol mani samting bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Remember this: he who sows sparingly will also reap sparingly. He who sows bountifully will also reap bountifully.

block.text: Yupela tingting gut long dispela. Man i planim liklik kaikai, em bai i kisim liklik kaikai tasol. Na man i planim planti, em bai i kisim planti.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let each man give according as he has determined in his heart; not grudgingly, or under compulsion; for God loves a cheerful giver.

block.text: Olsem na yupela olgeta wan wan i mas tingting gut pastaim na save gut long wanem samting yupela i laik givim. Nogut wanpela man i bel hevi long givim samting, na nogut em i ting ol man i strong tumas long em i mas givim. Dispela pasin bilong givim em i no gutpela. God i save laikim man i amamas na i givim samting long laik bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And God is able to make all grace abound to you, that you, always having all sufficiency in everything, may abound to every good work.
As it is written,

block.text: Na God em inap long givim olgeta kain gutpela samting long yupela, na bai yupela i gat planti tru. Olsem na oltaim yupela bai inap tru long olgeta samting, na planti samting bai i stap bilong yupela i ken mekim olgeta kain gutpela wok.
Buk bilong God i tok long dispela pasin olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He has scattered abroad, he has given to the poor. His righteousness remains forever.”

block.text: "Dispela man i save givim planti samting long ol rabisman, olsem man i tromoi nabaut pikinini kaikai bilong planim. Stretpela pasin bilong en i save stap oltaim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now may he who supplies seed to the sower and bread for food, supply and multiply your seed for sowing, and increase the fruits of your righteousness.

block.text: God i save givim ol pikinini kaikai long man bilong planim gaden, na em i save givim ol kain kain kaikai long olgeta man na ol i kaikai. Olsem tasol God bai i givim ol samting long yupela na yupela bai inap tru, na yupela i ken helpim ol arapela manmeri bilong God. Na ol gutpela pasin bilong yupela bai i kamap moa moa yet, olsem man i planim ol pikinini kaikai na bihain gaden bilong en i karim kaikai moa moa yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: God will enrich you in everything to all liberality, which works through us thanksgiving to God.

block.text: God i givim planti samting long yupela, na yupela inap long givim planti samting long ol arapela. Na long wok bilong mipela dispela presen bilong yupela bai i mekim ol dispela manmeri i tenkyu tru long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this service of giving that you perform not only makes up for lack among the saints, but abounds also through many givings of thanks to God;

block.text: Olsem na dispela wok yupela i mekim em bai i helpim ol manmeri bilong God, bai ol i no ken sot moa, na tu em bai i mekim ol i tenkyu moa yet long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: seeing that through the proof given by this service, they glorify God for the obedience of your confession to the Good News of Christ. For the liberality of your contribution to them and to all.

block.text: Dispela wok yupela i mekim bilong helpim ol, em bai i kamapim ples klia gutpela pasin bilong yupela. Na ol bai i save olsem, yupela i kisim tru gutnius bilong Krais na yupela i save bihainim gut tok bilong en. Na ol bai i lukim ol planti samting yupela i givim long ol na long olgeta arapela manmeri tu, na ol bai i litimapim nem bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They themselves also, with supplication on your behalf, yearn for you by reason of the exceeding grace of God in you.

block.text: Ol bai i save olsem, marimari bilong God em i pulap tru long yupela. Olsem na ol bai i laikim yupela tumas, na ol bai i prea long God na askim em long mekim gut long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now thanks be to God for his unspeakable gift!

block.text: Dispela presen God i bin givim yumi, em i bikpela moa, na yumi no inap autim gut olgeta tok bilong en. Yumi mas tenkyu long God long dispela presen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 CORINTHIANS 10
Now I Paul, myself, entreat you by the humility and gentleness of Christ; I who in your presence am lowly among you, but being absent am bold toward you.

block.text: Sampela man i save sutim tok long mi olsem, "Taim Pol i stap wantaim yumi em i save daunim em yet, tasol taim em i stap longwe em i save givim strongpela tok long yumi." Tasol mi Pol, mi laik bai yupela i tingting long pasin Krais i bin mekim bilong daunim em yet na mekim pasin isi long ol man, na mi askim yupela long tingting gut long dispela tok mi laik mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yes, I beg you that I may not, when present, show courage with the confidence with which I intend to be bold against some. With those who consider us to be walking according to the flesh.

block.text: Mi tokim yupela olsem, yupela i mas lukaut, nogut mi mas givim strongpela tok long yupela taim mi kam i stap wantaim yupela. Mi ting mi inap tru long givim strongpela tok long ol dispela man i ting mipela i save bihainim pasin bilong ol man bilong graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For though we walk in the flesh, we don’t wage war according to the flesh.

block.text: Tru, mipela i save stap long dispela graun, tasol mipela i no save pait olsem ol man bilong graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the weapons of our warfare are not of the flesh, but mighty before God to the throwing down of strongholds.

block.text: Olgeta samting bilong pait mipela i holim, ol i no samting bilong dispela graun. Nogat. Ol i gat strong bilong God, na ol inap brukim ol strongpela banis bilong ol birua.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We throw down imaginations and every high thing that is exalted against the knowledge of God. We bring every thought into captivity to the obedience of Christ;

block.text: Mipela i save daunim olgeta kain tingting na giaman tok i save pasim rot bilong ol man i laik kisim save long God. Na mipela i save kalabusim olgeta tingting bilong ol man, bilong mekim tingting bilong ol i bihainim laik bilong Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We are in readiness to avenge all disobedience, when your obedience will be made full.

block.text: Na mipela i wet long yupela. Sapos yupela i bihainim olgeta tok bilong mipela, orait mipela i redi long mekim save long olgeta man bilong sakim tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Do you look at things only as they appear in front of your face? If anyone trusts in himself that he is Christ’s, let him consider this again with himself, that, even as he is Christ’s, so also we are Christ’s.

block.text: Yupela i mas skelim gut ol dispela samting yupela i lukim. Sapos wanpela man i ting olsem em yet i stap man tru bilong Krais, orait em i mas tingting gut na bai em i save olsem, mipela tu i stap man bilong Krais, wankain olsem em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For though I should boast somewhat abundantly concerning our authority, (which the Lord gave for building you up, and not for casting you down). I will not be disappointed.

block.text: Bikpela i bin givim namba long mipela bilong mekim dispela wok. Em i laik bai mipela i strongim bilip bilong yupela, na em i no laik bai mipela i bagarapim yupela. Olsem na sapos mi amamas na litimapim nem bilong mipela liklik long dispela wok mipela i save mekim, mi bai i no inap sem long dispela tok mi mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I do not want to terrify you by my letters.

block.text: Tasol mi no laik bai yupela i ting mi man bilong raitim ol pas bilong pretim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For, “His letters,” they say, “are weighty and strong, but his bodily presence is weak, and his speech is despised.”

block.text: Tru, sampela man i save tok olsem long mi, "Ol pas bilong Pol i gat ol kain kain strongpela tok, tasol taim em yet i kamap na i toktok long yumi, yumi lukim em i no gat strong tru, na em i no save tru long pasin bilong autim tok."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let such a person consider this, that what we are in word by letters when we are absent, such are we also in deed when we are present.

block.text: Ol man i save mekim dispela kain tok, ol i mas tingting gut na save olsem, pasin mipela bai i mekim long taim mipela i kam i stap wantaim yupela, em bai i bihainim stret dispela tok mipela i raitim long pas long taim mipela i stap longwe long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we are not bold to number or compare ourselves with some of those who commend themselves. But they themselves, measuring themselves by themselves, and comparing themselves with themselves, are without understanding.

block.text: Mipela i no inap tok mipela i wankain olsem ol sampela man ol i save amamas na litimapim nem bilong ol yet. Na mipela i no inap tok, pasin bilong mipela i wankain olsem pasin bilong ol. Nogat. Dispela ol man ol i save skelim pasin bilong ol long skel bilong ol yet tasol. Wanpela i save skelim pasin bilong em yet long pasin bilong narapela. Ol man i mekim olsem, ol i no gat save tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But we will not boast beyond proper limits, but within the boundaries with which God appointed to us, which reach even to you.

block.text: Tasol mipela i no laik putim skel na namba bilong mipela i go antap, bai mipela i ken litimapim nem bilong mipela moa moa yet. Nogat. Mipela bai i mekim dispela wok God i bin makim bilong mipela, na skelim pasin bilong mipela long skel God yet i bin putim. Tasol mak bilong dispela wok God i bin givim mipela, em i go inap long Korin tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we don’t stretch ourselves too much, as though we didn’t reach to you. For we came even as far as to you with the Good News of Christ,

block.text: Namba na wok God i bin givim mipela, em i karamapim yupela, olsem na taim mipela i autim tok long yupela, mipela i no kalapim mak bilong mipela. Nogat. Mipela tasol i bin kamap paslain long ol arapela na bringim gutnius i kam long yupela ol Korin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: not boasting beyond proper limits in other men’s labors. But having hope that as your faith grows, we will be abundantly enlarged by you in our sphere of influence.

block.text: Mipela i no save kalapim mak bilong mipela na litimapim nem bilong mipela yet long wok ol arapela man i bin mekim. Nogat. Mipela i laik mekim stret dispela wok God i bin givim long mipela, olsem bai bilip bilong yupela i ken kamap strong, na wok bilong mipela i ken kamap bikpela namel long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We hope to preach the Good News even to the parts beyond you, not to boast in what someone else has already done.

block.text: Na bai mipela i ken bringim gutnius i go long ol dispela ples i stap baksait long yupela. Mipela i no inap i go long ol ples ol arapela man i mekim wok pinis long en, bai mipela i amamas na litimapim nating nem bilong mipela long wok ol arapela man i mekim pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But “he who boasts, let him boast in the Lord.”

block.text: "Man i laik amamas, em i mas amamas long Bikpela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: For it isn’t he who commends himself who is approved, but whom the Lord commends.

block.text: Yumi save, man i save amamas na litimapim nem bilong em yet, dispela man i no gat nem long ai bilong God. Nogat. Sapos Bikpela i litimapim nem bilong wanpela man, dispela man tasol i gat nem tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 CORINTHIANS 11
I wish that you would bear with me in a little foolishness, but indeed you do bear with me.

block.text: Mi laik bai yupela i larim mi na mi mekim tok kranki liklik. Inap yupela i larim mi?

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I am jealous over you with a godly jealousy. For I married you to one husband, that I might present you as a pure virgin to Christ.

block.text: God i gat strongpela laik tru long ol manmeri i mas stap aninit long em wanpela tasol, na long wankain pasin mi tu mi gat strongpela laik long yupela i mas bihainim tru Krais. Mi yet mi bin makim yupela bilong kamap ol lain bilong Krais, na mi laik givim yupela long Krais olsem mi bringim yangpela meri i stap klin tru i go long man em i laik maritim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I am afraid that somehow, as the serpent deceived Eve in his craftiness, so your minds might be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ.

block.text: Tasol mi ting long dispela snek i save tumas long pasin bilong giaman, na bipo tru em i bin giamanim Iv, na mi pret, nogut wankain samting i kamap long yupela. Nogut tingting bilong yupela i paul, na yupela i lusim pasin bilong i stap klin na tingting long Krais tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if he who comes preaches another Jesus, whom we did not preach, or if you receive a different spirit, which you did not receive, or a different “good news”, which you did not accept, you put up with that well enough.

block.text: Mi pret, long wanem, mi save, sampela man i save kam long yupela na autim tok bilong narapela Jisas, em i no dispela Jisas mipela i bin autim tok bilong en. Na long dispela pasin yupela i save kisim narakain spirit, em i no dispela Holi Spirit yupela i kisim bipo. Na yupela i save kisim narakain gutnius, em i no dispela gutnius yupela i kisim pinis. Na mi save, taim ol i mekim dispela pasin namel long yupela, yupela i save stap redi tasol long harim tok bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I reckon that I am not at all behind the very best apostles.

block.text: Harim. Mi ting mi no aninit liklik long ol dispela "namba wan aposel" bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But though I am unskilled in speech, yet I am not unskilled in knowledge. No, in every way we have been revealed to you in all things.

block.text: Maski sapos mi no save tumas long pasin bilong autim tok, save bilong mi i no sot liklik. Oltaim long olgeta pasin mipela i bin mekim, mipela i bin soim dispela save long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Or did I commit a sin in humbling myself that you might be exalted, because I preached to you God’s Good News free of charge?

block.text: Yupela i save, mi bin autim gutnius bilong God long yupela, na mi no bin kisim pe long dispela wok. Long dispela pasin mi bin daunim mi yet, bai mi ken litimapim yupela. Olsem wanem? Ating long dispela pasin bilong mi, mi bin mekim sin, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: I robbed other assemblies, taking wages from them that I might serve you.

block.text: Mi bin kisim ol mani samting long sampela sios, bilong helpim mi long mekim wok namel long yupela. Long dispela pasin i olsem mi bin stilim ol samting bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When I was present with you and was in need, I wasn’t a burden on anyone, for the brothers, when they came from Macedonia, supplied the measure of my need. In everything I kept myself from being burdensome to you, and I will continue to do so.

block.text: Taim mi bin i stap wantaim yupela, sapos mi sot long wanpela samting, mi no bin givim hevi long wanpela bilong yupela. Nogat. Ol brata i lusim Masedonia na i kamap long Korin, ol i bin lukautim mi long olgeta samting mi sot long en. Mi bin tingting strong long mi no ken givim hevi liklik long yupela, na mi save bihainim dispela tingting yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As the truth of Christ is in me, no one will stop me from this boasting in the regions of Achaia.

block.text: Tok tru bilong Krais em i stap wantaim mi, na mi tok tru tumas olsem, long olgeta hap bilong provins Akaia i no gat wanpela man inap pasim rot bilong mi long litimapim nem bilong mi long dispela pasin mi bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Why? Because I don’t love you? God knows.

block.text: Na bilong wanem mi mekim olsem? Ating mi no save laikim yupela tumas, a? Nogat tru. God i save pinis olsem, mi laikim yupela tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But what I do, that I will do, that I may cut off occasion from them that desire an occasion, that in which they boast, they may be found even as we.

block.text: Tasol sampela man i laik painim rot bilong litimapim nem bilong ol yet, bai ol i ken kamap wankain olsem mipela long ai bilong ol man. Na mi wok long pasim dispela rot long ol. Na bai mi wok olsem tasol i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For such men are false apostles, deceitful workers, masquerading as Christ’s apostles.

block.text: Dispela ol man ol i giaman aposel na giaman wokman. Ol i save senisim pasin bilong ol bilong mekim ol man i ting ol i stap aposel tru bilong Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And no wonder, for even Satan masquerades as an angel of light.

block.text: Na yupela i no ken kirap nogut long dispela pasin ol i mekim. Yumi save, Satan yet i save senisim pasin bilong en na kamap olsem ensel bilong lait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It is no great thing therefore if his servants also masquerade as servants of righteousness, whose end will be according to their works.

block.text: Olsem na sapos ol wokman bilong Satan tu i senisim pasin bilong ol na i mekim olsem ol wokman bilong stretpela pasin, yumi no ken kirap nogut long dispela. Bihain ol bai i kisim pe inap tru long dispela ol pasin ol i bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I say again, let no one think me foolish. But if so, yet receive me as foolish, that I also may boast a little.

block.text: Mi tok pinis olsem mi laik mekim tok kranki liklik, na taim yupela i harim dispela tok, yupela i no ken ting mi wanpela longlong man. Tasol sapos yupela i ting mi longlong, em tu inap. Tasol yupela i mas larim mi, na bai mi tu mi ken litimapim nem bilong mi liklik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: That which I speak, I don’t speak according to the Lord, but as in foolishness, in this confidence of boasting.

block.text: Mi no bihainim laik bilong Bikpela na mi mekim dispela tok. Nogat. Mi tok olsem krankiman na mi litimapim nem bilong mi yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Seeing that many boast after the flesh, I will also boast.

block.text: Planti man i save bihainim pasin bilong graun na ol i litimapim nem bilong ol yet. Olsem na mi tu mi bai bihainim dispela pasin na litimapim nem bilong mi yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you bear with the foolish gladly, being wise.
